name: Healthy & Delicious: Blueberry Salsa
description: Note: On Mondays, Kristen Swensson of Cheap, Healthy, Good swings by these parts to share healthy and delicious recipes with us. Take it away, Kristen! Recently, there was an article in Food & Wine about chef Tim Cushman, who was...

recipeInstructions.text: Combine ingredients in a small bowl and let sit for twenty to thirty minutes for flavors to blend.
Serve with tortilla chips or over grilled meat as a relish.
